We Are Send

Send (v.): To finish a route from the ground all the way to the anchors without falling or resting on gear.

Send defines our commitment to bring the latest Philippine climbing news to the forefront of our digitally-focused lifestyles. The magazine started as an idea: to have, in the midst of all the outdoor, mountaineering, and sports magazines, one that would fully cater to Filipino climbers and that would focus solely on rock climbing.

Ultimately, Send aims for more people to learn more about the sport, to reach and inspire more Filipinos to start climbing, and to push the boundaries of Philippine climbing.

Noel Queja
Contributor
Michelle Co
Contributor
Nick Aguilos
Contributor
